nodes.text: "TK-462" is a short story by Sylvain Neuvel, with art by Drew Baker, that was released on June 7, 2016 as part of Star Wars Insider 166. The story recounts the life of a stormtrooper. The story's early title, "TK-146275," was mistakenly used in the Star Wars Insider.

Sylvain Neuvel, the author of "TK-462," intended for the short story to have taken place from 14 to 4 years before the Battle of Yavin. However, this information is not officially established as canon.
